document_data.name: Tyche's touch
document_data.mainbody: Named for the ancient [[Tyche|goddess of luck]] who was split into [[Tymora]] and [[Beshaba]], '''''Tyche's touch''''' was a divine [[abjuration]] spell that granted either a protection or a curse to the target.
document_data.Effects: The protection or curse from this spell lasted a day and either aided or harmed the target of the spell as circumstances affected them.
document_data.History: Presumably this spell was first granted to clerics of [[Tyche]], but in later years divine spell casters of both [[Beshaba]] and [[Tymora]] were granted the spell.
